pyVIA core
========
see :ref:`_API-plotting`.
Initialize StaVia to fully utilize functions from :ref:` plotting <https://pyvia.readthedocs.io/en/latest/api/Plotting.html>`.
See :ref:`Basic workflow <https://pyvia.readthedocs.io/en/latest/ViaJupyter_Toy_Multifurcating.html>` for step-by-step instruction.

   :members: 
   :inherited-members:
   :exclude-members:
